Text.val: pi.CurrencyType : C = Fileds in client currency, H (or else) in Heller currency
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
07.04.2009 SH SCR14516 Removed 2 totals fields ("Correction for maximum finance"
12.04.2006 AK SCR10926 change access mode of tables CODE to READ

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CMCD_MARKCODE, cast(sum(CMCD_SPECIALACCOUNT:4) as decimal (13,2)), cast(avg(CMCD402_ADVANCEPERC) as decimal (3,0)), cast (sum (CMCD_EXTRAFINANCE:4) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CMCD :5 where CMCD_ADMNO = :2 and CMCD_CLNTNO = :3 and CMCD_EXTRAFINANCEC <>0 group by CMCD_MARKCODE order by CMCD_MARKCODE for fetch only
select cast (sum (CMCD_EXTRAFINANCE:4) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CMCD :5 where CMCD_ADMNO = :2 and CMCD_CLNTNO = :3 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
